thread.title: Security Expert Who Found Critical Flaw in Outlook Gets $24,000 Reward from Microsoft
thread.title_full: Security Expert Who Found Critical Flaw in Outlook Gets $24,000 Reward from Microsoft - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Security Expert Who Found Critical Flaw in Outlook Gets $24,000 Reward from Microsoft
text: Wesley Wineberg, a security researcher at Synack, received a bug bounty of $24,000 from Microsoft after discovering and reporting to the company a critical vulnerability affecting Live.com services that could be used by cybercriminals to infiltrate into almost any account. According to his own lengthy blog post where he provides technical details about how a successful explo... Â»
